firewall_blocked.yoArAt1Txt: You are attempting to access the server from the following IP address:
firewall_blocked.yoArAt2Txt:
This address was not found in the list of allowed IP addresses, or it could not be added. If you continue, you will no longer be able to access the server from this address. Do you wish to continue updating your firewall settings?

Note: If the above IP address is not the address of the workstation you are using, it is probably the address of a proxy server. In this case the proxy server's IP address must also be added.
firewall_blocked.yoArAt1ErrMsgTxt:
Firewall settings are saved.

You are attempting to access the server from the following IP address:
firewall_blocked.yoArAt2ErrMsgTxt: From this host, you will not be able to access this device anymore.

restrictIP.noEnabAlrtTxt: It is not possible to enable IP address filtering while the list of IP addresses is empty.
restrictIP.disabAlrtTxt: Disable IP address filtering before emptying the list of allowed IP addresses.
restrictIP.remIPConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the selected IP address(es) from the list?
restrictIP.maxAddrAlert: It is not possible to add any more addresses because the maximum number of Allowed IP Addresses has been reached.
restrictIP.remIpAdrStatTxt: Remove the selected IP address from the list
restrictIP.hlpTxt: Click here for help on this page

restrictIP_setup.setMaxAddrAlert: It's not possible to add this address because the maximum number of Filtered IP Addresses has been reached.
restrictIP_setup.setIpExistAlert: This IP address already exists in the list of Filtered IP Addresses.
restrictIP_setup.invalidAlert: This is an invalid IP address
restrictIP_setup.msgV4Alert: The value after '/' has to be an integer between 0 and 32.
restrictIP_setup.msgV6Alert: The value after '/' has to be an integer between 0 and 128.
restrictIP_setup.hlpTxt: Click here for help on this page
